casebody.data:
No. 10-5832. Gregg Moore, Petitioner v. United States Postal Service, et al. 562 U.S. 957, 131 S. Ct. 499,

178 L. Ed. 2d 283,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 7872. October 12, 2010.

Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied, and petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Seventh Circuit dismissed. See Rule 39.8.
